net.jawr.web.resource.bundle

Class InclusionPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.InclusionPattern

  • public class InclusionPattern
extends Object
    Inclusion pattern for bundles. Indicates wether a bundle should be considered global (a library), the order of inclusion if it is global, and the behavior for debugging.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InclusionPattern()
      Create a new inclusion pattern for a non-global bundle.
      InclusionPattern(boolean isGlobal, int inclusionOrder)
      Create a new inclusion pattern for a bundle to include in debug and non-debug mode. .
      InclusionPattern(boolean isGlobal, int inclusionOrder, DebugInclusion inclusion)
      Create a new inclusion pattern for a bundle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DebugInclusion getDebugInclusion()
      Returns the debug inclusion type
      int getInclusionOrder()
      For global bundles, states the order of inclusion.
      boolean isExcludeOnDebug()
      Indicates whether a bundle will not be included when debug mode is on.
      boolean isGlobal()
      Wether a bundle is global, if it is it will always be included on every page.
      boolean isIncludeOnDebug()
      Indicates whether a bundle will only be included when debug mode is on.
      boolean isIncludeOnlyOnDebug()
      Indicates whether a bundle will only be included when debug mode is on.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InclusionPattern

        public InclusionPattern(boolean isGlobal,
                int inclusionOrder,
                DebugInclusion inclusion)
        Create a new inclusion pattern for a bundle
        Parameters:
        isGlobal - If true, the bundle will be included before every other bundle.
        inclusionOrder - When isGlobal is true, this will set the order of inclusion of this bundle with respect to other global bundles.
        includeOnDebug - If true, this bundle will only be included in debug mode.
        excludeOnDebug - If true, this bundle will not be included in debug mode.

      • InclusionPattern

        public InclusionPattern(boolean isGlobal,
                int inclusionOrder)
        Create a new inclusion pattern for a bundle to include in debug and non-debug mode. .
        Parameters:
        isGlobal - If true, the bundle will be included before every other bundle.
        inclusionOrder - When isGlobal is true, this will set the order of inclusion of this bundle with respect to other global bundles.

        Create a new inclusion pattern for a non-global bundle.
